meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.1 ::date 2012-12-10T11:04:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt In New Westminster , a homicide occurred yesterday in an apartment where many Chinese reside , # ::save-date Tue Nov 25, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_1.txt
sentence: In New Westminster , a homicide occurred yesterday in an apartment where many Chinese reside ,

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.2 ::date 2012-12-13T06:44:40 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt A youth in his 20s was suspected to have been seriously attacked after he left a party ; he was found lying in one of the apartment units , and was pronounced dead upon arrival at the hospital . # ::save-date Thu Feb 4, 2016 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_2.txt
sentence: A youth in his 20s was suspected to have been seriously attacked after he left a party ; he was found lying in one of the apartment units , and was pronounced dead upon arrival at the hospital .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.3 ::date 2012-12-13T12:17:03 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt After the event , two men were detained by the police to assist in the investigations , the motive of the murder remains unclear , and the case is now referred to the Provincial Integrated Homicide Investigation Team for further investigations . # ::save-date Fri May 29, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_3.txt
sentence: After the event , two men were detained by the police to assist in the investigations , the motive of the murder remains unclear , and the case is now referred to the Provincial Integrated Homicide Investigation Team for further investigations .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.4 ::date 2012-12-13T12:16:55 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt According to the spokesman for the Provincial Integrated Homicide Investigation Team , Dale Carr , the crime scene was in an apartment unit on the 800 block of Agnes Street ( Agnes St. ) in New Westminster . # ::save-date Thu Jun 25, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_4.txt
sentence: According to the spokesman for the Provincial Integrated Homicide Investigation Team , Dale Carr , the crime scene was in an apartment unit on the 800 block of Agnes Street ( Agnes St. ) in New Westminster .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.5 ::date 2012-12-14T06:50:30 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The police received an emergency 911 call at 12:20 a.m. yesterday , and rushed to the address mentioned above to investigate . # ::save-date Mon Dec 12, 2016 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_5.txt
sentence: The police received an emergency 911 call at 12:20 a.m. yesterday , and rushed to the address mentioned above to investigate .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.6 ::date 2012-12-14T07:09:36 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt When the police arrived at the scene , they found an injured man lying in the unit ; he was seriously wounded , and certified dead upon arrival at the hospital . # ::save-date Thu Feb 4, 2016 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_6.txt
sentence: When the police arrived at the scene , they found an injured man lying in the unit ; he was seriously wounded , and certified dead upon arrival at the hospital .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.7 ::date 2012-12-14T07:27:05 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt The body was sent to the coroner for an autopsy in order to determine the cause of death . # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_7.txt
sentence: The body was sent to the coroner for an autopsy in order to determine the cause of death .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.8 ::date 2012-12-14T07:29:22 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt For now , the police will not announce the name of the victim ; it will be decided upon only after the family is notified . # ::save-date Thu May 14, 2015 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_8.txt
sentence: For now , the police will not announce the name of the victim ; it will be decided upon only after the family is notified .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.9 ::date 2012-12-14T07:33:28 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt As to the cause of the victim 's death , and whether the case is linked to any illegal activities and others and etc. , the police declined comment . # ::save-date Fri Sep 15, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_9.txt
sentence: As to the cause of the victim 's death , and whether the case is linked to any illegal activities and others and etc. , the police declined comment .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.10 ::date 2012-12-14T07:38:49 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Carr also said that the police had applied for a search warrant from the court yesterday morning , and entered the unit in the afternoon with the warrant for a detailed investigation , in order to understand more about the incident . # ::save-date Sat Apr 5, 2014 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_10.txt
sentence: Carr also said that the police had applied for a search warrant from the court yesterday morning , and entered the unit in the afternoon with the warrant for a detailed investigation , in order to understand more about the incident .

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.11 ::date 2012-12-14T07:56:36 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt Investigators from the Identification Bureau also went to collect information from the scene later , # ::save-date Fri Oct 20, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_11.txt
sentence: Investigators from the Identification Bureau also went to collect information from the scene later ,

meta_info: ::id wb.p2.5_c2e_0038.12 ::date 2012-12-14T08:11:53 ::annotator SDL-AMR-09 ::preferred # ::snt As to the motive of the attack , and whether the police had found the weapon , the police have declined disclosure . # ::save-date Fri Sep 15, 2017 ::file wb_p2.5_c2e_0038_12.txt
sentence: As to the motive of the attack , and whether the police had found the weapon , the police have declined disclosure .
